Blog.post: So, I was thinking about Jake Knapp yesterday, and I realized that he helped to play my trumpet (that doesnt sound like much) I remember he would ALWAYs compliment Kyle on how he played, and he would ALWAYS tell me, that I sucked, and that i wasn't loud enough, and that got me mad, and everytime he would be there to listen to the band play, he would do it again, and again, and everytime i tried to get better so he would FINALLY compliment me, that finally happened, a few practices before state or somewhere. He would always talk to me online, jake was a GOOD person, and will always be remembered. He touched everyone's life in a different way. So, yeah....That makes me realize that life is precious, and that we need to not take things for granted and be thankful for all of the things we have in our lifes. I'm so grateful, for my friends and my girlfriend, my family, EVERYTHING. Life is short. We need to live life to its fullest, no matter how hard it may get. Just some random thoughts, from over the past few days. Peace
